title: Matthew Crosby - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #31
itunes:title: Matthew Crosby - Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #31
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the hilarious comedian and writer MATTHEW CROSBY!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he and his guest go deep into the subject of mortality via cinema, and this week he is joined by the hilarious comedian, writer and ensemble player MATTHEW CROSBY!


It’s a super deluxe Valentine’s Day gem for you all this week, and with that spirit of love in the air for all, be you with a significant other or otherwise, you will have a perfectly charming and very funny time this week with Matthew and Brett. Enjoy this sit down chat with the fellas as they go in on everything, including Matthew’s film education via the VHS-based “shit Blockbusters” of his film school (and the warmth of watching film taped off telly), how meta his death is, the holding of his dad’s hand during a film (a thoroughly lovely moment), being a jack of many trades including teacher, misinterpreting films, how to not return to the ‘lit firework’ of sexiness experienced as a younger man (it’ll make sense in the fullness of time, just listen!), 20% shame, double double shame and a glorious engagement story! It’s all here. You’ll love it. Enjoy Matthew Crosby!


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

• MATTHEW on TWITTER!

• His sketch group PAPPY'S on TWITTER!

• MATTHEW on INSTAGRAM!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/filmstobeburiedwith.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
